content.rendered:
To Apply:
1. Begin with full Make Up in place. Lashes come last!
2. Remove lashes from tray and fit to natural lash line.
3. Trim excess band from outer corner.
4. Apply KOJI lash glue along entire band and wait 20 seconds for glue to become tacky.
5. Apply lash band to natural lash line using fingers or applicator using light pressure.

To Remove:
1. Use cotton swab dipped in makeup remover to dissolve glue along lash band.
2. Gently pull off lashes by hand.
3. Store lashes in original case after use.

Important note: Be sure to handle with care when removing them from the tray.

excerpt.rendered:
J Beauty Glamorous Lash are the very first line of occasion-centric, premium and cruelty-free false lashes in one case!

Timeless. Flawless. Flared. These are just a few words that describe this collection.

J Beauty Glamorous Lash comes in 4 designs of 5 pairs each.

Each tray consist of 20 lashes.
